mapper.select: SELECT C.PDT_NUM, C.MEM_ID, C.CART_AMOUNT, P.PDT_NAME, P.PDT_PRICE, P.PDT_DISCOUNT, P.PDT_IMG_FOLDER, P.PDT_IMG FROM CART_TBL C INNER JOIN PRODUCT_TBL P ON C.PDT_NUM = P.PDT_NUM WHERE C.MEM_ID = #{mem_id}
SELECT PDT_NUM, PDT_NAME, PDT_IMG_FOLDER, PDT_IMG, PDT_PRICE, #{odr_amount} as CART_AMOUNT, PDT_DISCOUNT FROM PRODUCT_TBL WHERE PDT_NUM = #{pdt_num}
